intro: An Oricorio dances sadly alone, without a partner.
title: Dancing Lessons
description:
The Oricorio doesn't seem aggressive, if anything it seems sad.

Maybe it just wants someone to dance with...

1.label: Battle It
1.selected: The Oricorio is distraught and moves to defend itself!
1.boss_enraged: The Oricorio's fear boosted its stats!

2.label: Learn Its Dance
2.selected: You watch the Oricorio closely as it performs its dance...$@s{level_up_fanfare}Your {{selectedPokemon}} learned from the Oricorio!

3.label: Show It a Dance
3.tooltip:
(-) Teach the Oricorio a Dance Move
(+) The Oricorio Will Like You
3.disabled_tooltip: Your Pokémon need to know a Dance move for this.
3.select_prompt: Select a Dance type move to use.
3.selected:
The Oricorio watches in fascination as
{{selectedPokemon}} shows off {{selectedMove}}!$It loves the display!$@s{level_up_fanfare}The Oricorio wants to join your party!

invalid_selection: This Pokémon doesn't know a Dance move
